title: Mass shootings in the U.S. : legality of shooter 's weapons , as of February 2020
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.
The Number of incidents is highest at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and lowest at Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
The difference of Number of incidents between the highest and lowest Category Of The Weapon is 81.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and lowest at Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.

The Number of incidents is highest at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and lowest at Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.

max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and lowest at Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
The highest Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has 81.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.

The Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has the highest Number of incidents, followed by Unknown/to be determined, and Illegally obtained. Down to the Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally which is the lowest.
The Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained tends to be 2.8 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Category Of The Weapons, we get total 117.0.

data.Category Of The Weapon: Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally
